Name: Motion Studio
About the game: Motion Studio delivers an entire, cataloged motion capture library for use in your Game, Film, and Animation projects. Features Quickly preview animations on hover Categorized motions for different projects Load motions into a large viewer with playback controls and frame scrubbing Export animations out into a format ready for import into most game engines Animations added with each new major version Motion Studio provides a complete suite of animations that are ready for your game, movie, and art projects out of the box.
Meta Title: Motion Studio: Apr 26, 2021, Filmstorm and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Motion Studio? Check out the release date (Apr 26, 2021), developer insights from Filmstorm, and a complete game summary.
